definition: grid (in vacuum tubes)/gate (terminal of a field-effect transistor)

sentences.english: The working properties depend on the gate bias voltage and the structure of pectinate Al electrode.
sentences.chinese: 其工作特性依赖于栅极电压和梳状铝电极的结构。

sentences.english: The floating gate is positioned between the source and drain regions.
sentences.chinese: 浮动栅极定位于源极区与漏极区之间。

sentences.english: Well, what if the plate also followed the grid?
sentences.chinese: 然后，如果屏级同样跟随栅极又会怎么样呢？

sentences.english: The gate insulating layer may be a high-K material.
sentences.chinese: 栅极绝缘层可以是高K的材料。

sentences.english: A source region and a drain region are formed in the fin at the opposite sides of the gate electrode.
sentences.chinese: 源区和漏区形成在鳍部内栅极的相对侧处。

sentences.english: The grid circuit is out of order.
Temperature drift with different grid voltage is different, too.
sentences.chinese: 不同的栅极电压下的温度漂移也不相同。

sentences.english: The gate electrode is formed on the gate insulating film and has a sidewall .
sentences.chinese: 栅极电极在栅极绝缘膜上形成，并具有侧壁。

sentences.english: The gate electrode is formed on the gate insulating film and has a sidewall .
sentences.chinese: 栅极电极在栅极绝缘膜上形成，并具有侧壁。

sentences.english: The method of the present invention can greatly increase evenness of the grid oxide layer.
sentences.chinese: 采用本发明的方法可大幅提高栅极氧化层的均匀性。

definition: abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
